## OpenIntro Statistics

This is the text Eric and Nic currently use, there is no explicit mention of R.

[![](https://d2sofvawe08yqg.cloudfront.net/os/s_hero?1620484636){fig-align="center" width="200"}](https://www.openintro.org/book/os/)

## Modern Dive

Modern Dive is a Statistics Text with Data Science Flavor. It relies heavily on the tidyverse.

[![](images/ModernDive.png){fig-align="center" width="200"}](https://moderndive.com/index.html)

## Introduction to Modern Statistics.

IMS teaches Statistics with the tidyverse.

[![](https://d2sofvawe08yqg.cloudfront.net/imstat/s_hero?1624230565){fig-align="center" width="200"}](https://moderndive.com/index.html)
